summary: Reeling from her husband's affair, Rose collides with a marooned teenager in a boarded-up Delaware beach town.
cast: Greta Gerwig|Olly Alexander|Eleonore Hendricks|Amy Seimetz|Adam Rothenberg|Dan Seely|Sam Calagione|H.D. Parsons|Kevin Miller|Shirley Miller|James Miller|Susan Betts|John Bochnowski|Stefanie Vinopal
title: The Dish & the Spoon
